events.message: We have received your application for the software engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under software engineering roles after initial screening paperwork.
A recruiter who specializes in software developer roles has been assigned to your case to guide you through the hiring process.
We completed the initial screening today, and your background in software development looks promising.
Thank you for providing your availability and answering our initial questions with thorough detail.
Your technical interview has been scheduled with our senior developer team for next Tuesday at 2 PM UTC.
The technical interview was completed successfully. Your coding skills and problem-solving approach impressed the panel.
We have arranged your HR interview with our human resources team on Thursday at 11 AM UTC.
Your HR interview was completed today and the team was pleased with your cultural fit and communication skills.
We have put together an offer for the software engineer position and sent it to you for review.
You responded with appreciation for the offer and requested a follow-up to discuss contract details.
You have officially accepted the offer. We are excited to have you join our engineering team.
Your onboarding process has started. Welcome to the team! We have shared all required resources and schedules.
The hiring case is now closed successfully with your official start at the company completed.
